channel.title: I need help making it so you can only connect to my server using mopar client!
channel.description:
My server, runs smooth and nice, lag free...until... :|...the cheat clients come in. Where they can just log in my server...File > Crash or File > Null you know. Theres a way on how to make a server only be connected with the moparscape client. Could anyone help me do this?
Would be VERY apretiated Thank you.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2007, 02:15:56 PM[/size][hr]please
